Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing business owners the ability to indicate a language preference for agency inspections.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing business owners the ability to indicate a language preference for agency inspections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing business owners the ability to indicate a language preference for agency inspections.
